Uses of Package
com.amazon.ags.api.achievements

Packages that use com.amazon.ags.api.achievements
com.amazon.ags.api   
com.amazon.ags.api.achievements   
 

Classes in com.amazon.ags.api.achievements used by com.amazon.ags.api
AchievementsClient
          The Amazon Games AchievementsClient Service client object Get this object from AmazonGames to access all AchievementsClient Service operations
 

Classes in com.amazon.ags.api.achievements used by com.amazon.ags.api.achievements
Achievement
          Represents a single achievement.
GetAchievementResponse
          The service response to a call to AchievementsClient.requestAchievement() Includes the Achievement asked for and the information encapsulated in the generic RequestResponse
GetAchievementsResponse
          The service response to a call to AchievementsClient.requestAchievements() Includes the list of achievements for the game and the information encapsulated in the generic RequestResponse
UpdateProgressResponse
          The service response to a call to AchievementsClient.updateProgress() Includes unlocked status of the achievement and the information encapsulated in the generic RequestResponse
